Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: Empty calories is something diet culture has made up. All calories have value, especially in eating disorder recovery.   I've been trying to add more fats into my diet and have found this really helps to keep me full. Other than that, reducing foods that are high volume (looking at you, vegetables) that don't keep me full for long and having more protein and complex carbs helps as well.

Author: etherealaqua
